article.source: The Laurel | "Fostering cooperation among legislative newspapermen (and women, and broadcast journalists, and bloggers, and media junkies)."
article.author: dubymcd
article.title: Men on the Move
article.text:
Farewell to a beloved and revered leader within the FOX61 newsroom. Senior Executive Producer Spencer Brooks is leaving after 7 years to accept a major job at TEGNA sister station WUSA in DC.

Also bidding farewell to FOX61: Brian Didlake. He’s filed his last report for the station. He can’t yet say where he’s headed, but from congratulatory tweets it sounds like a station in a warmer climate.

And on the print side, Hartford Courant reporter and podcast producer Mike Hamad is headed to…Hearst CT. Mike was the music critic for the Courant from 2013-18.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The post Men on the Move appeared first on The Laurel | "Fostering cooperation among legislative newspapermen (and women, and broadcast journalists, and bloggers, and media junkies).".

He can’t yet say where he’s headed, but from congratulatory tweets it sounds like a station in a warmer climate.
